collection.name: Goons of Balatroon
collection.description:
[GOB Website](https://goonsofbalatroon.com/) | [Goon Bods](https://opensea.io/collection/goonbods) | [Buy Card Packs](https://goonsofbalatroon.com/store) | [Join us on Discord](https://discord.gg/goonsnft)  

A 2D/3D hybrid metaverse featuring Free 2 Play 2 Earn card strategy gaming and land ownership. Ridiculous. Chaotic. Fun. Play for free and earn! 

Welcome to Balatroon, where you can challenge your friends to epic card game battles! Earn and use $GOB to craft rare cards, level up, and customize your characters.   

**Rewards**: Earn $GOB by holding Goons or [Goon Bods](https://opensea.io/collection/goonbods)  
**Collect**: Rare and powerful Goon Cards  
**P2E Gaming**: Q2 2022
